name: Curse of the Gambler
description:
This is a horrible prototype of a third person roguelike shooter.

The base concept is you have been cursed after loosing a bet.
Now every action you take will cause you to loose coins and if the coins reach zero.... you die!
But if manage to gather enough coins you will eventually be able to escape.

(shoot stuff.... get coins.... win :D )

Controls:
WASD            Movement
Lift Click       Shoot
Spacebar      Jump
Shift                Dash
